content: little angel amigurumi is about 7 5 cm 3 inches tall i used small ply balinese cotton yarn 8 ply sport yarn and tulip hook no 2/0 2 mm hook used stitches magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet increase = single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet in next st decrease = single_crochet decrease join next 2 sts into 1 slip_stitch = slip_stitch the free pattern can be found here 1 the printable pdf is a total of 5 pages this pattern is available in english and indonesian 1 https //crochethea com/en/little-angels-amigurumi
